tool_description: This API reproduces PUBLIC data and features of Zalando.com
name: Unofficial Zalando
title: Unofficial Zalando

api_list.name: products/detail
api_list.description: Get detailed information of a product

required_parameters.name: configSku
required_parameters.description: The value of "sku" field returned in .../products/list endpoint. Ex : SNE81A003-Q11

api_list.name: categories/list
api_list.description: List all available categories. Used to build the navigation menu.

api_list.name: auto-complete
api_list.description: Get suggestions by terms or phrases, then use the returned values for "fullTextQuery" field with .../products/list endpoint

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Terms or phrases related to any type of clothes
